verses.text: \w Later|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w*, \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H1423"\w* \w goat|strong="H5795"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife. “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w want|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* wife \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w room|strong="H2315"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3117"\w* said. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* father would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* enter.

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* sure \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* thoroughly \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*,” said \w her|strong="H5414"\w* father, “\w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* accompanied \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Is|strong="H2896"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* sister \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w*? \w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w*.”

\w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6430"\w* \w be|strong="H7451"\w* \w blameless|strong="H5352"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w*. \w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w he|strong="H8147"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w torches|strong="H3940"\w*, \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w foxes|strong="H7776"\w* tail-to-tail, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fastened \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w torch|strong="H3940"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* \w pair|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w tails|strong="H2180"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* lit \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w torches|strong="H3940"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w released|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* foxes \w into|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w* \w grain|strong="H7054"\w* \w of|strong="H3754"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* piles \w of|strong="H3754"\w* \w grain|strong="H7054"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w standing|strong="H7054"\w* \w grain|strong="H7054"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* well \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w groves|strong="H2132"\w*.

“\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*?” \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* demanded. “\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H6430"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son-in-law|strong="H2860"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Timnite|strong="H8554"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H6430"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w*. “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* wife \w was|strong="H6430"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w companion|strong="H4828"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* father \w to|strong="H5927"\w* death.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* \w rest|strong="H2308"\w* \w until|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w taken|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5358"\w* \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w ruthlessly|strong="H7785"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w then|strong="H3381"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cave \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w deployed|strong="H2583"\w* themselves near \w the|strong="H5927"\w* town \w of|strong="H5927"\w* \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*?” said \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* Philistines replied, “\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* arrest \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w pay|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H6213"\w* response, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cave \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w Etam|strong="H5862"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w realize|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied.

But \w they|strong="H3027"\w* said \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w We|strong="H6435"\w* \w have|strong="H6430"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* arrest \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.” \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* replied, “\w Swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w kill|strong="H6293"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3027"\w*.”

“\w No|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3588"\w* answered, “\w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* tie \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* securely \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.” \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* bound \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* led \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* Samson arrived \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w shouting|strong="H7321"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w mightily|strong="H6743"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w burnt|strong="H1197"\w* \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bonds|strong="H5688"\w* broke \w loose|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w fresh|strong="H2961"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w*, \w reached|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H8123"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* said: “\w With|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* I have piled \w them|strong="H5221"\w* into \w heaps|strong="H2565"\w*. \w With|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w of|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* I have \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand men.”

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Samson \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w jawbone|strong="H3895"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Ramath-lehi|strong="H7437"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w being|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w thirsty|strong="H6770"\w*, Samson \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* accomplished \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H8668"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*. \w Must|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* God opened \w up|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hollow|strong="H4388"\w* \w place|strong="H4388"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*. \w When|strong="H3117"\w* Samson \w drank|strong="H8354"\w*, \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w strength|strong="H7307"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w revived|strong="H2421"\w*. \w That|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w En-hakkore|strong="H5875"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* remains \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lehi|strong="H3896"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Samson \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.
